gbuild.slider

Class GSlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • gbuild.GComponent
      • gbuild.slider.GSlider

extends GComponent

      • pos

        public void pos(java.lang.Integer... coords)
        Description copied from class: GComponent
        Specify the location for component

        It is possible to define the location in three different ways:

        1. pos(x, y) when (x, y) will be set
        2. pos(x) when x will be set
        3. pos(null, y) when y will be set
        Overrides:
        pos in class GComponent
        Parameters:
        coords - integer coordinates (x, y)

      • pos

        public void pos(java.lang.Float... coords)
        Description copied from class: GComponent
        Specify the location for component

        It is possible to define the location in three different ways:

        1. pos(x, y) when (x, y) will be set
        2. pos(x) when x will be set
        3. pos(null, y) when y will be set
        Overrides:
        pos in class GComponent

      • dim

        public void dim(java.lang.Integer... dimensions)
        Description copied from class: GComponent
        Specify the dimension for component.

        It is possible to define the dimension in three different ways:

        1. dim(w, h) when (w, h) will be set
        2. dim(w) when w will be set
        3. dim(null, h) when h will be set
        Overrides:
        dim in class GComponent
        Parameters:
        dimensions - integer dimensions (w, h)

      • value

        public int value()
        Get current value for slider
        Returns:
        value value for slider

      • setValue

        public void setValue(int value)
        Adjust current value for slider

        Since sliders has a fixed range, passed value must be greater or equal than minimum value, and less or equal than maximum value

        Parameters:
        value - value for slider

      • limits

        public processing.core.PVector limits()
        Return the limits for current slider
        Returns:
        limits for slider

      • setLimits

        public void setLimits(int minValue,
                      int maxValue)
        Adjust limits for current slider

        Since sliders has a fixed range, passed limits must have two numbers where first number is less than the second one.

        Parameters:
        minValue - minimum value for slider
        maxValue - maximum value for slider
